project_descr: To enhance Belize’s institutional and organizational capacities for sustainable natural resource management for the effective leveraging of finances to meet Rio Convention Objectives.

outputs.output_descr: The goal of this project is for Belize to meet and sustain Rio Convention obligations through a more holistic and cost-effective approach of environmental and nat. resource mgmt for shared national development and global environmental priorities.

project_title: capacity-building for sustainable natural resource mgmt
